General.Name: Beijing Navigation Control Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Beijing Navigation Control Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and services inertial devices, inertial navigation systems, satellite navigation systems, and integrated navigation systems. The company also offers guidance control units, electric steering gears, inertial components, inertial navigation products, image seekers, and simulation test equipment for teaching and research work. In addition, it develops navigation products suitable for various applications, such as drones, unmanned ships, automatic driving, energy exploration, and surveying and mapping, as well as provides technical services related to navigation, and guidance and control systems. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Block A, Xinyuan Science and Technology Park, Beijing, China, 102206
